name: Dead End - a fps parkour game
name_original: Dead End - a fps parkour game
description:
This is a fps parkour game inspired by Karson, which is another fps parkour game made by a youtuber call dani

In the game, you need to move around in a giant maze and defeat the enemies to get point,  but In the meantime, you also need to make sure you don' t fall into lava or you will be dead instantly.

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • while in air press A or W to move side ways
  • A + W key or D + W key to jump on walls
  • Space for jump
  • Shift to slide under obstacles while moving
  • mouse scroll wheel for switch weapons
  • press R to manual reload

 

This is the first 3d game I ever made, thanks for downloading and remember to checkout my YouTube channel!

 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1lG1HuHwjpBLVtm8Dbe0CQ
